name: Home-Strider
description:
Created for the Indie Tales Game Jam, with the prompt of "One Room." 

Follow the Lonesome Cowboy on his quest to take back his prized lasso, stolen from him by the Ol' Scoundrel. Frantically maneuver around the inside of your trusty mech to destroy robotic beasts of the future and to take back what's yours. 

-Hoop Snake Games
